question: Will Jonas Gahr Støre become the next Prime Minister of Norway?
description:
This market will resolve to the individual who is formally appointed Prime Minister by royal decree of the King of Norway in the Council of State following the 2025 parliamentary election.

If no such decree is issued—for example, in cases of government continuity—the sitting Prime Minister at the time the King appoints ministers for the new cabinet will be considered the winner.

If the incumbent Prime Minister and cabinet are confirmed by a consensus of credible reporting to have secured re-election without the need for a new decree or formal appointment, the market will resolve accordingly.

If no new government is appointed by December 31, 2025, the market will resolve to the most recently appointed permanent Prime Minister.

Only Prime Ministers who take office as a result of an election will qualify. Any interim or caretaker Prime Minister—including those serving under Norway’s standing incapacity rule—will not count toward the resolution of this market.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the Government of Norway; however, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

events.title: Next Prime Minister of Norway
events.description:
The next Norwegian Parliamentary Election is scheduled to take place on September 8, 2025.

This market will resolve to the individual who is next officially appointed as Prime Minister of Norway following the 2025 parliamentary election.

To count for resolution, the individual must be formally appointed by the King of Norway in the Council of State. Any interim or caretaker Prime Minister will not count toward the resolution of this market.

If no such Prime Minister is confirmed by June 30, 2026, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to “Other.”

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the Government of Norway; however, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Will FC Porto win Group A at the FIFA Club World Cup?
description:
This market will resolve according to the club that wins Group A at the 2025 FIFA Club World Cup. 

If at any point it becomes impossible for this club to win Group A at the FIFA Club World Cup based on the rules of FIFA (e.g., they are eliminated in the group stage), this market will resolve immediately to “No”.

If the 2025 FIFA Club World Cup is permanently canceled or has not been completed by October 13, 2025, 11:59 PM this market will resolve to “Other”.

The primary resolution source will be official information from FIFA, however, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Will Norway vs. Italy end in a draw?
description:
In the upcoming FIFA World Cup Qualifier game, scheduled for June 6 at 2:45 PM ET,
If the game ends in a draw, this market will resolve to “Yes”. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve to “Yes”.

question: French Open: Sabalenka vs. Swiatek
description:
Aryna Sabalenka and Iga Swiatek are scheduled to play each other in a semi-final round matchup in the French Open women's singles tournament on June 5, 2025, at 9:00 AM ET. 

This market will resolve to “Sabalenka" if Aryna Sabalenka advances against Iga Swiatek in the semi-final round of the French Open women's singles tournament.

This market will resolve to “Swiatek" if Iga Swiatek advances against Aryna Sabalenka in the semi-final round of the French Open women's singles tournament.

If the match ends in a tie, is canceled, or delayed beyond June 16, 2025, this market will resolve to 50-50.

The primary resolution source will be official information from the French Open (https://www.rolandgarros.com/en-us/), however, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Israel intercepts Greta Thunberg's ship before reaching Gaza?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if by June 30, 2025, 11:59 PM ET, the vessel Madleen, while carrying Greta Thunberg, is physically intercepted, redirected, detained, or boarded by any Israeli military or governmental authority before it reaches the terrestrial territory of the Gaza Strip. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

This includes enforcement of a naval blockade, boarding by armed forces, the use of force, electronic warfare, or threats to prevent the ship from completing its mission. Voluntary rerouting or delays due to weather, mechanical issues, or internal decisions not caused by external pressure will not qualify.

The vessel will be considered to have reached the terrestrial territory of the Gaza Strip if the vessel comes within 100 meters of the Gaza shoreline. Entry into Gaza’s maritime zone will not alone qualify.

The resolution source will be a consensus of credible reporting.

question: Bitcoin all time high before July?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if any Binance 1 minute candle for BTCUSDT between 04 June '25 13:00 and 30 June '25 23:59 in the ET timezone has a final “High” price that is higher than any previous Binance 1 minute candle's "High" price on any prior date. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the BTCUSDT "High" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT with “1m” and “Candles” selected on the top bar.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTCUSDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

description:
This market will resolve according to the final "Close" price of the Binance 1 minute candle for BTC/USDT 5 June '25 17:00 in the ET timezone. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

question: Williams vs. Gustafsson
description:
This is a market on whether Khaos Williams vs. Andreas Gustafsson will win their bout at UFC 316: Dvalishvili vs. O'Malley, scheduled for June 7, 2025.

If Khaos Williams is declared the winner of this bout, this market will resolve to "Williams".
If Andreas Gustafsson is declared the winner of this bout, this market will resolve to "Gustafsson". 
If this fight is declared a draw, or if for any reason the match is not scored, postponed after July 14, 2025, or canceled, this market will resolve 50-50.

The primary resolution source will be ESPN; however, a consensus of credible reporting may be used.

events.title: UFC 316: Dvalishvili vs. O'Malley 2
events.description: This is a market on the outcomes and results of the UFC 316: Dvalishvili vs O'Malley 2 event.

question: Will Israel raid Greta Thunberg's ship by Friday?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if, if by June 6, 2025, 11:59 PM ET, Israeli military or law enforcement personnel physically board the vessel Madleen, while carrying Greta Thunberg, without authorization or consent from the crew or organizers. Otherwise, it will resolve to "No."

Escorting, shadowing, or issuing warnings without boarding does not count. Boarding with the crew’s consent also will not count.

The resolution source will be a consensus of credible reporting.
